name: Bayani - Fighting Game [Demo]
description:
This is a FREE DEMO version of the game with 1 character and stage to play. You can play vs a computer opponent or locally with a friend. Keyboard and controller support is available. The early access version on Steam currently have 6 characters and 5 selectable stages.

BAYANI is a fast-paced 1-on-1 indie fighting game that features a simplified 6 button control scheme. It is designed with accessibility in mind as it is meant to be easy to pick-up for newcomers to the fighting game genre. 

The game is now available on Steam Early Access
